casebody.data:
Lucien D. Coman, plaintiff and respondent, vs. William H. Storm, defendant and appellant. It was decided in this, case that a person charged in execu-. tion, though allowed to go upon the limits, is a prisoner, within the statute,authorizing prisoners to apply for discharge. ’

*706Before Bosworth, Ch. J. and White and Monell, JJ.

Heard November 7th, 1863 ; decided November 14th, 1863.

See the point decided, stated in the index to this volume, under the title, “ Imprisoned Debtors.”

See the appeal from an order, with the opinion of the court by Boswobth, Oh. J. reported at length in 26 How. Pr. 84.
